settings.name: host
settings.title: Backend Host
settings.description: Hostname/IP of the Interview Automator backend

settings.name: port
settings.title: Backend Port
settings.description: Port of the Interview Automator backend

settings.name: topic
settings.value: Prepare Yourself to answer job interview questions.
settings.title: Conversation Topic
settings.description: First message to ChatGPT that defines topic of the whole conversation

settings.name: debug_enabled
settings.title: Debug enabled
settings.description: If enabled, some debug related features will be visible

settings.name: transcription
settings.title: Transcription
settings.description: Transcription of voice message sent to backend

settings.name: init_file_path
settings.title: Initialization file path
settings.description: Path to file with initialization data in the device's local filesystem

settings.name: voice_file_path
settings.title: Voice message file path
settings.description: Path to which store file with voice recording, can be default App path

settings.name: timeout
settings.title: Timeout to Backend
settings.description: Connect timeout (seconds) to Interview Automator backend

qa.title: Q&A Theory 1
qa.question:
You have given part of interview session. Interview were held for middle java software developer position. Interview was in Russian. 
Here is text transcription of given interview part: 
{transcription} 
Extract all questions asked by interviewer.

qa.title: Q&A Theory 2
qa.question:
Answer to all questions just extracted by you from given transcription part. Generate JSON containing questions and answers. Your answer should contain generated JSON only, nothing else. 
JSON structure should be following: { "interview_session": [ "question": "", "answer": "", ... ] }

qa.title: Q&A Livecoding 1
qa.question:
You have given part of interview session. Interview were held for middle java software developer position. Interview was in Russian. 
Here is text transcription of given interview part: 
{transcription} 
In given interview part interviewer describes coding assignment for interviewee (in Russian). You have to implement Java program based on interviewee's description of the program.

qa.title: Q&A Livecoding 2
qa.question:
Rewrite the program you just generated, taking into account the comments given by the interviewer. These are the interviewer's comments: 
{transcription}

qa.title: Q&A Softskills 1
